page.title: 12DOMESTIC ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Houses surveyed had many electrical appliances;food prepation is made easy bythe use of cookers, ovens, fridges, food processors,kettles, toasters and freezers,& some micro-wave ovens.The 3 main meaqls per day are breakfast, lunch and supper.Popular breakfast foods are cereals,toast,tea or coffee.On weekdays, many people take sandwiches to work or schoolfor a light lunch.A larger hot meal of meat & vegetables & a pudding is eaten later in the day.'Convenience'food - factory preared -is popular.Favourite food with children is chips & coke. Washing machines heat water,soak,wash, rinse & spin dry in about 1 hour; the damp clothes can then be spin dried and ironed straight away.Almost every house has a vacuum cleaner,sewing machine, hair dryer & electric shaver Motor lawnmowers & diggers are used.
